item.title: Dialist Privacy Policy
item.description: Ridiculous Haircut, LLC built the Dialist app as a commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by Ridiculous Haircut, LLC and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of user Personal Information. Information Collection and Use Dialist needs access to your device’s Contacts database in order to provide it’s functionality. However, that data is not collected by or stored by Ridiculous Haircut, LLC.

item.title: Dialist
item.description: Dialist started when someone couldn’t remember the name of a restaurant. The number was in their contacts app, but with hundreds of contacts and no name to search by it was essentially impossible to find. Adding infrequently used contacts to the Favorites list would be an easy fix, but it just abuses and bloats the Favorites. Wouldn’t it be great if we could have multiple Favorites lists? One for work, one for family, one for takeout, etc.

item.title: About Ridiculous Haircut
item.description: Ridiculous Haircut is all about making life a little easier. It’s just getting started, so watch this space…
